title: The parking area to be made available at individual site shall be at minimum 100 sq
clause_text: The parking area to be made available at individual site shall be at minimum 100 sq.mt. at one place either at Ground floor / Stilt floor or first floor.
section: Incentive for providing Public Parking in the area falling within the radius of 200 m. from the Metro / MRTS Station.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
